auction_discount.description: Auciton discount rates for the position liquidation

auction_threshold_rate.description: Auciton start condition; if the ratio between asset value <> collateral value exceed, the position auction will be open

collateral_denom.description: Collateral should be one of the coin

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
